snippet: In exchange for a guilty plea, Ilya Lehman, who ran a music school for children in Manhattan, will receive a two-year sentence.
lead_paragraph: In exchange for a guilty plea, Ilya Lehman, who ran a music school for children in Manhattan, will receive a two-year sentence.

headline.seo: Music Teacher Pleads Guilty to Molesting 9-Year-Old Student
headline.main: Music Teacher Pleads Guilty to Molesting Girl, 9
headline.print_headline: Music Teacher Pleads Guilty to Molesting Girl, 9
